Home.title: The Best Place for
Home.text: Shop now for all your home needs, including furniture, decor, office furniture, and home appliances, from Homzmart. Purchase at the best prices in Egypt, with delivery right to your doorstep.

Services.title: Our Services for
Services.text: Explore our wide range of services, from home decoration to interior design consultations. Our experts are here to make your dream home a reality.

Shop.title: Shop by
Shop.text: Find the perfect items for every room in your home. Browse our categories and start shopping now.

servicesPage.title: Welcome to Services Page
servicesPage.description: We make it easy for you to get the best services. We provide you with a distinctive shopping experience with excellent customer service.

whyChooseSection.title: Why Choose Us

support247.title: 24/7 Support
support247.description: Support team available 24/7 to help you

Auth.enterYourInfo: Enter your information to get started
Auth.enterEmailToSignIn: Enter your email below to SignIn to your account

footer.description: This text is for demonstration purposes only. Use this text to help you get a better idea of what the text looks like and how it appears. This is not the final text, but a placeholder.

offer.saleDescription: Don't miss out on our biggest sale of the season. Limited time offer!
offer.subscribeText: *Subscribe to get updates about our exclusive offers and discounts
offer.subscriptionSuccess: Thank you for subscribing to our sale updates!

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Decorate your space with eco-friendly furniture with low VOCs, environmentally friendly materials and safe coatings.

unbeatableQuality.title: Unbeatable quality
unbeatableQuality.description: We choose raw materials from the best manufacturers, so our furniture and decor are of the highest quality at the best prices.

deliveryToYourDoor.title: Delivery to your door
deliveryToYourDoor.description: We will deliver to your door anywhere in the world. If you're not 100% satisfied, let us know within 30 days and we'll solve the problem.

SupportSection.heading: Need Help?
SupportSection.description: Our team is ready to help you at any time. Contact us for the best services.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.desc: Explore our collection of stunning images showcasing our work and inspiration.

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa.description: If you are unable to scan the QR Code , Please enter this code manually into the app
2fa.verifyDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code from your Google Authenticator app to complete setup.

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.emptyCartMessage: Browse our products and add some to your cart!
cart.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.
